abilities.name: The Swarm
abilities.description: Launches a swarm of 12 beetles that latch onto enemy units, damaging and reducing their armor over time.
abilities.notes: Launches 12 beetles that latch onto enemies, reducing armor and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Shukuchi
abilities.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining maximum movement speed and becoming invisible. If Weaver damages an enemy while invisible, the invisibility is lost and the enemy takes bonus damage.
abilities.notes: Weaver can pick up or drop items without breaking invisibility. Invisibility breaks upon attack point, cast point, or successful attack.

abilities.name: Geminate Attack
abilities.description: Allows Weaver to dispatch a second attack on an enemy after a short delay.
abilities.notes: The second attack carries all attack modifiers.

abilities.name: Time Lapse
abilities.description: Weaver warps backward to where it was five seconds ago. Restores health and mana to what they were at that time.
abilities.notes: With Aghanim's Scepter, can be cast on allied heroes. Can be cast while stunned or silenced.

innate_abilities.name: Rewoven
innate_abilities.description: Grants attack range bonus after each ability cast.
innate_abilities.notes: Provides temporary attack range after using abilities.
